title: Unsteady
description: The storm rages, casting light in the shadows, forcing you to face the aftermath. Running away is futile.Broken. Traumatized. Consumed. Delani Delvecchio has been through more heartbreak in her life than most can handle. She’s strong—stronger than she thought herself capable—but her victory comes with consequences.She’s slipping—slipping from reality and fearing everything around her. Nightmares are controlling her mind, demons from the past are playing tricks, and her foundation is cracking. Loyal. Determined. Faithful.Brody Russell saved Delani from hell, only to be faced with a hell of his own. Being a small-town cop, he thought he’d been prepared for the repercussions of helping Delani, but now, he’s facing a trial that’s determined to break him, and all he wants is his love for Delani to survive the fallout. Emotions run high, boundaries are pushed, and the odds stacked against them become a race against time. The storm might be over, but the devastation has taken its toll. Surviving is the only option, but will it be enough?
author: Jillian Anselmi
